article_title: Hobby Lobby Owners Win First Round In $3 Million Tax Refund Case

article_metadata.description: Hobby Lobby became well known for its challenge to the contraceptive mandate under the Affordable Care Act (Obamacare) succeeding in carving out an exemption under the Religious Freedom Restoration Act in the Supreme Court decision Burwell v Hobby Lobby. Founder David Green ranks number 88 in the Forbes 400.  A decision [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter J Reilly
